trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que pode ser arrastado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control can be included in another control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, to let the user change the control's value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle pode ser incluído em um outro controle, como um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controle para permitir que o usuário altere o valor do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> can also be used to resize controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> também pode ser usado para redimensionar controles.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control in the corner of a window can provide a location for the user to click with the mouse to start a resize operation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle no canto de uma janela pode fornecer um local para o usuário clicar com o mouse para iniciar uma operação de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> provides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> events to manage drag operations associated with the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> Fornece <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> arraste de eventos para gerenciar operações associadas com o ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the left mouse button, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives logical focus and mouse capture, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário pressiona o botão esquerdo do mouse, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle recebe foco lógico e captura do mouse e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control has focus and mouse capture, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event can be raised multiple times without limit.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle tem foco e mouse capturar, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> evento pode ser gerado várias vezes sem limite.

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the left mouse button, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control loses mouse capture and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário libera o botão esquerdo do mouse, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle perde a captura do mouse e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The event information provides a change in position, but does not reposition the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: As informações de evento fornece uma alteração na posição, mas não reposicionar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.

trans-unit.source: You must manually change or reposition the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> or any other elements that you want to resize or change as a result of the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Você deve alterar manualmente ou reposicionar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> ou outros elementos que você deseja redimensionar ou alterar como resultado da operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control does not provide drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle não oferece a funcionalidade de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control can receive mouse capture, but cannot receive keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle pode receber captura do mouse, mas não pode receber o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> property that corresponds to keyboard focus is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> que corresponde ao foco do teclado está definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the parent class <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> that sets this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor substitui a classe pai <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> que define essa propriedade como `true`.

trans-unit.source: To provide drag capability, class handling is provided for the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> events.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer a funcionalidade de arrastar, manipulação de classe é fornecida para o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> e <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> eventos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that scrolls content in a viewable area, or viewport, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> reflects the size of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> faz parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> que rola o conteúdo em uma área visível, ou o visor, o tamanho do controle a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> reflete o tamanho do visor.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a classe <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control that is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> controle que faz parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration")
trans-unit.target: ![Ilustração de barra de rolagem](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "ilustração da barra de rolagem")

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Thumb Control
trans-unit.target: Personalizando o controle Thumb

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade a vários <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controles, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, see [Thumb Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/thumb-syles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, consulte [Syles Thumb e modelos](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/thumb-syles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade é presente no modelo padrão do controle de botão e é definida usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: Cancels a drag operation for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />.
trans-unit.target: Cancela uma operação de arrastar para a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has mouse capture and logical focus, this method removes mouse capture and raises a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> tem foco lógico e captura do mouse, este método remove a captura do mouse e gera um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> perde a captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event occurs when the left mouse button is released or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> evento ocorre quando o botão esquerdo do mouse é liberado ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle recebe a captura do mouse quando o usuário pressiona o botão esquerdo do mouse ao pausar o ponteiro do mouse sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle.

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event occurs is provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs> of the last <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: A posição do mouse quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> evento ocorre é fornecido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs> do último <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: Informações de evento encaminhado

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: Estratégia de roteamento

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: Bolha

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: delegado

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control, and how to define the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como atribuir um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> evento para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle e como definir o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [Exemplo de funcionalidade de arrastar do elevador](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs one or more times as the mouse changes position when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control has logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre uma ou mais vezes, conforme o mouse muda de posição quando um controle de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> tem foco lógico e captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle recebe foco e mouse captura quando o usuário pressiona o botão esquerdo do mouse ao pausar o ponteiro do mouse sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control loses mouse capture when the user releases the left mouse button, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle perde a captura do mouse quando o usuário libera o botão esquerdo do mouse, ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event occurs each time the mouse position moves on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> evento ocorre sempre que a posição do mouse se move na tela.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this event can be raised multiple times without a limit when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control has mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, esse evento pode ser gerado várias vezes sem um limite quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle tem captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: Informações de evento encaminhado

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: Estratégia de roteamento

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: Bolha

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: delegado

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control, and how to define the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como atribuir um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> evento para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle e como definir o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [Exemplo de funcionalidade de arrastar do elevador](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control receives logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> recebe foco lógico e captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle recebe foco e mouse captura quando o usuário pressiona o botão esquerdo do mouse ao pausar o ponteiro do mouse sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: Informações de evento encaminhado

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: Estratégia de roteamento

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: Bolha

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: delegado

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control, and how to define the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como atribuir um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> evento para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> controle e como definir o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [Exemplo de funcionalidade de arrastar do elevador](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control has logical focus and mouse capture and the left mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> tem o foco lógico e a captura do mouse e se o botão esquerdo do mouse é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control has focus and mouse capture; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> tiver o foco e a captura do mouse; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property changes its value, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> propriedade altera seu valor, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: Começando com o .NET Framework versão 3.0 Service Pack 1, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> tem um setter protegido.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Para usar essa funcionalidade, seu aplicativo deve ter como destino o .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais, confira [Versões e dependências](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer" /> para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Responde a uma alteração no valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação trata o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> evento definindo <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> para `true`.

trans-unit.source: Also, this method gives the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> logical focus and mouse capture, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, esse método oferece o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> foco lógico e captura do mouse e conjuntos de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> propriedade para `true`.

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação também gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação trata o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> evento definindo <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> para `true`.

trans-unit.source: Also, this method removes mouse capture from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, este método remove a captura do mouse do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>e define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação também gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has logical focus and mouse capture, this implementation raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event when the mouse moves.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> tem foco lógico e captura do mouse, essa implementação dispara o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> evento quando o mouse se move.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event is handled by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Nesse cenário, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> evento é manipulado definindo <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> para `true`.
